document.full_text: activision blizzard posted higher profit and revenue in the fourth quarter, driven by sales of online games, and raised its full-year earnings outlook, sending its shares higher in after-hours trade.
document.title: activision blizzard's profit rises on digital sales
lines_and_colors: activision blizzard posted higher profit and revenue in the fourth quarter, driven by sales of online games, and raised its full-year earnings outlook, sending its shares higher in after-hours trade.
